items.title: Trump team aligns with Tesla in looking to end required crash reporting | REUTERS
items.author: Reuters
items.content:

items.author: Reuters
items.content:
ðŸ›¸ New Jersey resident Evan Cutler says he recently saw an object "about the size of a school bus" in the sky, adding that "people are actually starting to panic a little bit." items.title: Inside Syriaâ€™s security apparatus by a journalist once held
items.author: Reuters
items.content:
Reuters journalist Suleiman al-Khalidi  (https://www.reuters.com/authors/suleiman-al-khalidi/) was arrested by Syrian security police in 2011 during an uprising against President Bashar al-Assad. Hear what al-Khalidi witnessed back then and what it was like to see prisoners freed after Assadâ€™s downfall. (https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/bewildered-elated-prisoners-pour-out-assads-jails-flung-open-2024-12-08/) 






You can read Suleiman's account of his detention from 2011 here (https://www.reuters.com/article/world/witness-shattered-humanity-inside-syrias-security-apparatus-idUSTRE74P2VD/) .
